Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கறுத்துஇன்னா செய்தவக் கண்ணும் மறுத்தின்னாசெய்யாமை மாசற்றார் கோள்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: It is the determination of the spotless not to do evil, even in return, to those who have cherished enmity and done them evil.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A spotless, virtuous person ('மாசற்றார்') is shown being actively harmed by an enemy who is filled with burning hatred ('கறுத்து இன்னா செய்தவர்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The spotless person has the clear opportunity and power to retaliate in kind ('மறுத்து இன்னா'). A spectral weapon of vengeance materializes in their hand.
Layered_Composition.Background: However, adhering to their core principle ('கோள்'), they are shown deliberately letting the weapon of vengeance dissolve into light. They refuse to return harm for harm ('செய்யாமை'). This act of non-retaliation is their ultimate victory.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The principle of the spotless is to refrain from retaliatory harm, even against an enemy who is actively harming them out of pure malice.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The dissolving weapon of vengeance is the key visual metaphor. It shows a conscious and powerful choice to break the cycle of violence. Their strength is in their refusal to stoop to their enemy's level.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Supreme self-control, non-retaliation, principled, higher morality.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The enemy and their act of hatred are depicted in fiery, chaotic reds and blacks. The spotless person is surrounded by a calm, pure, white light. As they dissolve the weapon of vengeance, their light grows stronger, pushing back the darkness of hatred.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dramatic close-up on the spotless person's face, capturing their serene expression as they make the powerful choice to not retaliate.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with advanced particle effects for the dissolving weapon.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The primary light source is the growing aura of the non-retaliating person.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: High fantasy art, symbolic battle of principles.
